Colt M4A1 5.56x45 Assault Rifle.Name: weapon_colt_m4a1_556x45
Colt M4A1 5.56x45 Assault Rifle.Description: Colt M4A1- an assault rifle (carbine), designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 5.56x45 NATO cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.

5.56x45 M193 Ball ammo.Name: ammo_box_556x45_xx_m193ball
5.56x45 M193 Ball ammo.Description: A box of 5.56x45 M193 Ball ammo

Factory exit key.Name: exitkey
Factory exit key.Description: Chemical factory emergency exit door key.

PM 9x18PM pistol.Name: weapon_izhmeh_pm_9x18pm
PM 9x18PM pistol.Description: A time-proven PM. Due to the ubiquitous spread of both pistol and ammo it is still being used by Russian Spetznaz, thanks to exceptional reliability, light weight and compact size. The only serious drawback is its lack of a knockdown power.

RGD-5 hand grenade.Name: РГД-5
RGD-5 hand grenade.Description: RGD-5 (Distance Hand Grenade, mod. 5) is classified as antipersonnel fragmentation time-delayed offensive hand grenade. Igniter delay time 3,2—4,2 seconds. Due to offensive type of the grenade, fragments are relatively light and have a smaller radius of dispersion.

90-93 9x18PM Magazine, for 8 PM rounds.Name: mag_pm_izhmeh_9x18pm_8
90-93 9x18PM Magazine, for 8 PM rounds.Description: Standard 8-round PM 90-93 magazine for IzhMekh-produced PM pistols. Features a side observation slot.

PMAG GEN M3 20 5.56x45 STANAG 20-round m.Name: mag_stanag_magpul_pmag_gen_m3_556x45_20
PMAG GEN M3 20 5.56x45 STANAG 20-round m.Description: 20-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 20 magazine, for 5.56x45 ammo.

0.6L water bottle.Name: Бутылка воды 0.6
0.6L water bottle.Description: A bit dirty 0.6L bottle of water.

Army Crackers.Name: хлебцы армейские
Army Crackers.Description: Hard and unforgiving water crackers from Russian army combat ration.

Roubles.Name: Рубли
Roubles.Description: A few notes of the still-valued Russian roubles.

Wad of roubles.Name: Пачка рублей
Wad of roubles.Description: A wad of the still-valued Russian roubles.

AN/PEQ-15 tactical device.Name: tactical_all_insight_anpeq15
AN/PEQ-15 tactical device.Description: ATPIAL (Advanced Target Pointer Illuminator Aiming Laser) AN/PEQ-15 produced by L3 Insight Technologies. Tactical device that combines laser designators in both visible and IR band with IR searchlight.

ER Fulcrum Bayonet.Name: ER Bayonet
ER Fulcrum Bayonet.Description: Extrema Ratio developed its Fulcrum knife by the order of Italian Alpine Troops Headquarters, who required a multipurpose knife suitable for the infantry, a knife that could be used in any action and that could successfully solve any type of problem even where more specialized equipment proved inadequate. It was so successful that the multipurpose knife then led to the development of the Fulcrum Bayonet, which had the same characteristics but could be fixed to the issued rifle.

MP-133 12ga shotgun.Name: weapon_izhmeh_mr133_12g
MP-133 12ga shotgun.Description: Multi-shot, smoothbore МP-133 pump-action shotgun produced by IzhMekh. Reliable and practical hunting and self-defense weapon. Considered unique in its class for having a slide stop.

Secure container Alpha.Name: Контейнер Альфа
Secure container Alpha.Description: Unique secure container used only by veterans of PMCs formerly deployed in Tarkov.

40-round PMAG GEN M3 40 5.56x45 STANAG m.Name: mag_stanag_magpul_pmag_gen_m3_556x45_40
40-round PMAG GEN M3 40 5.56x45 STANAG m.Description: 40-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 40 magazine for 5.56x45 ammo.

60-round MAG5-60 5.56x45 STANAG magazine.Name: mag_stanag_surefire_mag5_556x45_60
60-round MAG5-60 5.56x45 STANAG magazine.Description: 60-round metal Surefire MAG5-60 high capacity magazine for 5.56x45 ammo.

Colt USGI A2 5.56x45 Flash hider for AR-.Name: muzzle_ar15_colt_usgi_a2_556x45
Colt USGI A2 5.56x45 Flash hider for AR-.Description: The 5.56x45 Colt USGI A2 Flash hider a.k.a. Bird Cage is designed for mounting on 5.56x45 weapons built on AR-15 system. However, it can be installed on other weapons of the same caliber, provided that barrel has the same threading for muzzle devices. A service muzzle device for M4A1.

Leupold Mark 4 HAMR 4x24mm DeltaPoint hy.Name: scope_all_leupold_mark4_hamr
Leupold Mark 4 HAMR 4x24mm DeltaPoint hy.Description: Hybrid Leupold-produced scope comprises the Mark 4 HAMR 4x24mm optical sight with  DeltaPoint reflex sight installed on top of it. It was developed for precision mid-range carbine fire using the 4x optics while being equally effective in close quarters thanks to use of compact reflex sight when necessary.

Crye Precision AVS platecarrier.Name: standartRig
Crye Precision AVS platecarrier.Description: Crye Precision AVS rig equipped with light armored plates from combined materials. One of the most comfortable to wear plate-carrier.

Flyye MBSS Backpack.Name: standartBackpack
Flyye MBSS Backpack.Description: Extra durable backpack made from 1000D Cordura with a separate pocket for water bladder and MOLLE attachment system on the sides.

Aseptic bandage.Name: bandage
Aseptic bandage.Description: The most common gauze bandage, autoclaved and aseptic.

Immobilizing splint.Name: item_meds_alusplint
Immobilizing splint.Description: Common splint for fixing the damaged bones in position as an emergency aid measure.

Analgin painkillers.Name: painkiller
Analgin painkillers.Description: The most cheap and widely spread painkillers.

Morphine injector.Name: morphine
Morphine injector.Description: Single-use syringe full of morphine - powerful drug, used primarily to treat both acute and chronic severe pain.

Salewa FIRST AID KIT.Name: salewa
Salewa FIRST AID KIT.Description: First aid kit containing bivibag, various types of bandages and dressing tools.

Leatherman Multitool.Name: mtool
Leatherman Multitool.Description: With this compact and versatile multitool there is no need to be worried about having the right tools on at the right time.

Russian Army pineapple juice.Name: juice_army
Russian Army pineapple juice.Description: Reconstituted pineapple juice "Russian Army". It's hard to imagine a better source of carbs and vitamins under the blockade conditions.

Slickers bar.Name: slippers
Slickers bar.Description: Sweet nutritional bar for some quick bite. Well-balance in proteins, fiber and vitamins, but a bit over the top in sweetness.

5.56x45 mm M855.Name: patron_556x45_M855
5.56x45 mm M855.Description: Ball cartridge with a steel penetrator tip over a lead core in a full copper jacket.

5.56x45 mm M855A1.Name: patron_556x45_M855A1
5.56x45 mm M855A1.Description: Enhanced Performance Round, 19-grain steel penetrator tip over a copper alloy core in a partial copper jacket.

Camelbak Tri-Zip Backpack.Name: bigBackpack
Camelbak Tri-Zip Backpack.Description: Mid-sized versatile assault pack. Spacious, sturdy and comfortable, this backpack is loved both by military and hikers worldwide. 34L of total space, hydration system, easy access to side pockets, near-perfect suspension and MOLLE attachment system make it a great choice for up to 72 hours autonomous hikes... or carrying a good load of loot.

6B43 Zabralo-Sh 6A Armor.Name: heavy
6B43 Zabralo-Sh 6A Armor.Description: The 6B43 bulletproof vest of 6А protection class (roughly equivalent to class IIIA) is designed for protection from light weapons bullets - including BP and PP - fragments of grenades, mines, and melee weapons, as well as reducing the risk of after-penetration effects during combat situations.

Tactical glasses.Name: Goggles
Tactical glasses.Description: Commonplace tactical glasses with glare and impact protection.

SV-98 bolt-action sniper rifle.Name: weapon_izhmash_sv-98_762x54r
SV-98 bolt-action sniper rifle.Description: SV-98 is a Russian sniper rifle developed in 1998-2000 by a group of weapon engineers led by V. Stronskiy. Serially produced by IzhMash group. It is a magazine-fed bolt-action rifle, designed to engage the military personnel at the distances of up to 1000 m.

Eotech EXPS3 holographic sight.Name: scope_all_eotech_exps3
Eotech EXPS3 holographic sight.Description:
Eotech EXPS3 holo sight. Thanks to design features it can be used with a wide range of weapons even with non-folding sights.
Compatible with night vision devices by the means of NV reticle mode. Utilized by US SOCOM as a sight for operations in confined spaces.

PMAG GEN M3 W 30 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round.Name: mag_stanag_magpul_pmag_gen_m3_window_556x45_30
PMAG GEN M3 W 30 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round.Description: 30-round polymer Magpul PMAG GEN M3 30 magazine, for 5.56x45 ammunition, with an observation slot.

Magpul MOE AR-15 pistol grip.Name: pistolgrip_ar15_magpul_moe
Magpul MOE AR-15 pistol grip.Description: Polymer Magpul MOE (Magpul Original Equipment) pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 pistol grips. Thanks to the ergonomic shape and anti-slip texture, it makes weapon grip and control more comfortable. Inside of the grip contains free space for spare parts, tools and accessories kit or batteries.

Tango Down Stubby BGV-MK46K tactical gri.Name: foregrip_all_tango_down_stubby_bgv_mk46k_blk
Tango Down Stubby BGV-MK46K tactical gri.Description: Tango Down Stubby BGV-MK46K tactical grip. Short grip for use with weapons of close and extra close quarters combat. Ideally fits assault shotguns. Contains a compartment for batteries or SPTA.

10-round polymer magazine 7.62x54R for S.Name: mag_sv98_izhmash_sv98_std_762x54r_10
10-round polymer magazine 7.62x54R for S.Description: Standard Izhmash-produced polymer magazine for SV-98 rifle, 7.62x54R ammo.

Upper receiver Colt M4A1 5.56x45 for M4A.Name: reciever_ar15_colt_m4a1_std
Upper receiver Colt M4A1 5.56x45 for M4A.Description: Upper receiver for M4A1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. Equipped with a mound for attaching additional devices.

260mm barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5..Name: barrel_ar15_260mm
260mm barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5..Description: A barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 260mm long. Corresponds with standard service M4 CQBR barrel.

370mm barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5..Name: barrel_ar15_370mm
370mm barrel for AR-15 and compatible 5..Description: A barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 370mm long. Corresponds with standard service M4A1 barrel.

610mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun.Name: barrel_mr133_610mm
610mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 610 mm long for 12ga shells.

510mm barrel for MP-133 12ga.Name: barrel_mr133_510mm
510mm barrel for MP-133 12ga.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 510 mm long for 12ga shells.

610mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun wit.Name: barrel_mr133_610mm_plank
610mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun wit.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 610 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

Colt AR-15 charging handle for AR-15.Name: charge_ar15_colt_charging_handle
Colt AR-15 charging handle for AR-15.Description: Standard charging handle for AR-15 and compatible systems.

Knight's Armament KAC RIS handguard for.Name: handguard_ar15_kac_ris
Knight's Armament KAC RIS handguard for.Description: Knight's Armament KAC RIS is a standard service handguard for M4A1, but it can be installed on the most of AR-15 based weapons provided that the barrel length is right. Equipped with 4 mounts for installation of additional accessories and a heat shield.

Izhmekh MP-133 Beechwood forestock.Name: handguard_mr133_izhmeh_std
Izhmekh MP-133 Beechwood forestock.Description: Standard Izhmekh-manufactured forestock, made for MP-133 shotgun out of beechwood.

Custom plastic MP-133 forestock with mou.Name: handguard_mr133_custom_rail
Custom plastic MP-133 forestock with mou.Description: Off-standard polymer forestock by third party producer for MP-133. Equipped with 2 short and 2 long mounts for installation of additional equipment.

30-round 6L23 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Name: mag_ak74_izhmash_6L23_545x39_30
30-round 6L23 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Description: 30-round polymer Izhmash 6L23 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems.

45-round 6L26 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Name: mag_ak74_izhmash_6L26_545x39_45
45-round 6L26 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Description: 45-round polymer Izhmash 6L26 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems.

60-round 6L31 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Name: mag_ak74_izhmash_6L31_545x39_60
60-round 6L31 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Description: 60-round quad-stack polymer Izhmash 6L31 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems. Produced as a small batch, never serialized.

10-round Saiga 545 5.45x39 magazine for.Name: mag_ak74_izhmash_saiga_545_std_545x39_10
10-round Saiga 545 5.45x39 magazine for.Description: 10-round polymer Izhmash Saiga 545 magazine, for the AK-based civilian carbine of the same name, for 5.45x39 ammo.

6-shell MP-133x6 12ga magazine.Name: mag_mr133_izhmeh_12g_6
6-shell MP-133x6 12ga magazine.Description: 6-shell capacity tube magazine by Izhmekh, for MP-133 12ga shells.

8-shell MP-133x8 12ga magazine.Name: mag_mr133_izhmeh_12g_8
8-shell MP-133x8 12ga magazine.Description: 8-shell capacity tube magazine by Izhmekh, for  MP-133 12ga shells.

PM/PPSH 9x18PM 84-round drum mag for PM.Name: mag_pm_custom_9x18pm_84
PM/PPSH 9x18PM 84-round drum mag for PM.Description: Makeshift 84-round PM magazine. First assembled by an unknown genius by combining PM and PPSH magazines into a single design for operations in narrow spaces with the aid of ballistic shields. Although it was never serialized even in the smallest number, it can be crafted pretty easily provided you have the donor mags and skillful hands.

Colt AR-15 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round magaz.Name: mag_stanag_colt_ar15_std_556x45_30
Colt AR-15 5.56x45 STANAG 30-round magaz.Description:
30-round metal Colt AR-15 magazine designed in compliance with STANAG 4179 standard for 5.56x45 ammo.
The STANAG 4179 standard was approved by NATO members in 1980 for the purposes of unification of allied personnel ammo and magazines.

Kiba Arms International SPRM mount for p.Name: mount_all_custom_top_rail_13
Kiba Arms International SPRM mount for p.Description: The universal SPRM 13-position mount by Kiba Arms International, for attaching additional devices to the pump-action shotguns.

Delta-tek Sprut mount for pump-action sh.Name: mount_mr133_deltatech_sprut
Delta-tek Sprut mount for pump-action sh.Description: The Delta-tek Sprut mount is developed for installation on tube magazines of pump-action shotguns like МP-133, МP-153, МP-135, Benelli M2, Winchester 1300 and so on. Features 3 Weaver mounts for attachment of additional devices.

High Standard M4SS Stock.Name: stock_ar15_high_standart_m4ss
High Standard M4SS Stock.Description: Telescopic High Standard M4SS stock closely follows the classic M4A1 stock except for few geometry details.

UTG Low Profile A2 Frontsight AR-15.Name: sight_front_ar15_utg_low_gas_block_a2
UTG Low Profile A2 Frontsight AR-15.Description: Detachable UTG Low Profile A2 Frontsight, installed over Windham Weaponry Gas Block.

Colt A2 AR-15 pistol grip.Name: pistolgrip_ar15_colt_a2
Colt A2 AR-15 pistol grip.Description: Colt A2 polymer pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 grips. Standard service grip for all AR-15-based weapons of US Army and USMC.

Colt A2 Rearsight AR-15.Name: sight_rear_ar15_colt_a2
Colt A2 Rearsight AR-15.Description: Detachable Colt A2 Rearsight. Standard issue for M4A1.

Surefire SOCOM556-MONSTER 5.56x45 silenc.Name: silencer_socom_surefire_socom556_monster_556x45
Surefire SOCOM556-MONSTER 5.56x45 silenc.Description: Surefire SOCOM556-MONSTER 5.56x45 and .223 silencer, can only be installed on compatible Surefire muzzle devices.

Surefire SOCOM556-MINI MONSTER 5.56x45 S.Name: silencer_socom_surefire_socom556_mini_monster_556x45
Surefire SOCOM556-MINI MONSTER 5.56x45 S.Description: Surefire SOCOM556-MINI MONSTER 5.56x45 and .223 silencer is a shorter version of the SOCOM556-MONSTER. Can only be installed on compatible Surefire muzzle devices.

Daniel Defence RIS II 9.5 foregrip for A.Name: handguard_ar15_dd_ris_ii_9,5_blk
Daniel Defence RIS II 9.5 foregrip for A.Description: Daniel Defence RIS II 9.5 foregrip is a part of the SOPMOD Block II program to replace the standard M4CQBR or Mk18 foregrips in the US SOCOM service. Made with light but durable aircraft aluminium alloy. Equipped with 4 mounts for installation of additional devices and accessories. This foregrip option is incompatible with М203 UBGL.

510mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun wit.Name: barrel_mr133_510mm_plank
510mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun wit.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 510 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

540mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun.Name: barrel_mr133_540mm
540mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 540 mm long for 12ga shells.

540mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun wit.Name: barrel_mr133_540mm_plank
540mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun wit.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 540 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

660mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun.Name: barrel_mr133_660mm
660mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 660 mm long for 12ga shells.

660mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun wit.Name: barrel_mr133_660mm_plank
660mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun wit.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 660 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

710mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun.Name: barrel_mr133_710mm
710mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 710 mm long for 12ga shells.

710mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun wit.Name: barrel_mr133_710mm_plank
710mm barrel for МR-133 12ga shotgun wit.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 710 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

750mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun.Name: barrel_mr133_750mm
750mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 750 mm long for 12ga shells.

750mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun wit.Name: barrel_mr133_750mm_plank
750mm barrel for MP-133 12ga shotgun wit.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for MP-133, 750 mm long for 12ga shells, with wide upper rib.

Remington Tactical Choke 12ga.Name: muzzle_12g_remington_tactical_12
Remington Tactical Choke 12ga.Description: Remington Tactical Choke 12ga was developed specifically for use on tactical shotguns and self-defence shotguns. Combines the properties of both cylinder and flashhider.

Plastic pistol grip for МP-133/153.Name: stock_mr133_pistol_plastic
Plastic pistol grip for МP-133/153.Description: Plastic pistol grip for MP-133 and MP-153 shotguns for replacement of standard stock, manufactured by Izhmekh.

Plastic stock for MP-133/153.Name: stock_mr133_plastic_long
Plastic stock for MP-133/153.Description: Plastic stock for МR-133 and MP-153 shotguns with rubber butt-plate manufactured by Izhmekh.

Wooden stock for MP-133/153.Name: stock_mr133_std_long
Wooden stock for MP-133/153.Description: Wooden stock for MP-133 and MP-153 shotguns with rubber butt-plate manufactured by Izhmekh.

Izhmash SV-98 Rearsight.Name: sight_rear_sv-98_izhmash_std
Izhmash SV-98 Rearsight.Description: Standard SV-98 sniper rifle rear sight by Izhmash.

SV-98 anti-heat ribbon.Name: tactical_sv-98_izhmash_heat_ribbon
SV-98 anti-heat ribbon.Description: Anti-heat ribbon for an SV-98 sniper rifle. Applied to the barrel. Prevents hot air from rising directly from the barrel and creating optical distortions in the line of fire.

Zenit 2P Klesch flashlight + laser desig.Name: tactical_all_zenit_2p_kleh_vis_laser
Zenit 2P Klesch flashlight + laser desig.Description: Underbarrel-mounted LED flashlight "2P Klesch + LCU" produced by Zenit.

7.62x54 R SNB ammo.Name: ammo_box_762x54r_xx_SNB
7.62x54 R SNB ammo.Description: A pack of 7.62x54 R SNB cartridges

AK-74N 5.45x39 assault rifle.Name: weapon_izhmash_ak74n_545x39
AK-74N 5.45x39 assault rifle.Description: Kalashnikov 5.45 mm assault rifle, developed in 1970 by М. Т. Kalashnikov, became a further evolution of AKM due to adoption of the new 5.45x39 ammunition by the military. The key design difference from the standard АК-74 is a side mount for optical and night scopes.

Peltor ComTac 2 headset.Name: headphones
Peltor ComTac 2 headset.Description: The Com-Tac 2 amplifies low-level sounds while suppressing impulse noises. Water resistant for outdoor usage.

BlackRock chest rig.Name: bearRig
BlackRock chest rig.Description: Artisan custom-made chest rig for wearing on top of armor in urban operations. Sturdy and versatile, it features both MOLLE and ALICE attachment systems.

PACA Soft Armor.Name: notHeavy
PACA Soft Armor.Description: Light but durable and reliable body armor protecting only the vital areas, fitted with II class armor plates.

Zenit RP-1 charge handle for AK.Name: charge_ak_zenit_rp1
Zenit RP-1 charge handle for AK.Description:
RP-1 charge handle by Zenit is a milled detail, manufactured with D16T aluminium alloy with black coating. Compatible with all models of AK rifles and carbines based on it. 
RP-1 is larger and more convenient than the standard charge handle, which improves the weapon ergonomics and makes handling more comfortable. The RP-1 is installed above the base handle through kit-enclosed bolts. © Zenit

CAA RS47 foregrip for AK-compatible syst.Name: handguard_ak_caa_quad_rail_polymer
CAA RS47 foregrip for AK-compatible syst.Description: The RS47 foregrip, manufactured by Command Arms with light polymer, fits the majority of rifles and carbines built on the base of АК. Equipped with two short and two long rail mounts for installing additional devices.

Polymer AK-74 foregrip (6P20 Sb.9).Name: handguard_ak_izhmash_ak74m_std_plastic
Polymer AK-74 foregrip (6P20 Sb.9).Description: Polymer AK-74 foregrip produced by Izhmash that replaced the classic wooden one.

UltiMAK M1-B handguard for AK.Name: handguard_ak_ultimak_m1b_std_plastic
UltiMAK M1-B handguard for AK.Description: M1-B designed by Ultimak only replaces the standard gas tube, turning it into a scope mount. The lower foregrip part remains the same; in this case, polymer AK-47 foregrip. Additionally fastened to the barrel for improved reliability.

B-10М foregrip and rail mount B-19.Name: handguard_ak_zenit_b10m_b19
B-10М foregrip and rail mount B-19.Description: Integrally machined B-10M foregrip is manufactured from aluminum alloy D16T with black coating and can be installed instead of the standard-issue foregrip on AK series 103, 104, 105, 74S, 74M, AKM, and AKMS. B-19 rail mount is basically sight support hovering over the gas tube. Also integrally machined from D16T aluminum alloy with black coating, it can be installed on B-10M or B-21M foregrips.©Zenit

GP-34 underbarrel grenade launcher.Name: launcher_ak74_izhmash_gp34
GP-34 underbarrel grenade launcher.Description: Underbarrel grenade launcher for 40mm VOG-25 grenades, installed on AK family of assault rifles.

Tactica Tula 10000 mount.Name: mount_ak_tactica_tula_10000
Tactica Tula 10000 mount.Description: Universal mount for АК dust cover, manufactured by Tactica Tula company. Designed for installation of optical scopes, collimator sights, laser designators and other devices and accessories on АК systems family and semiautomatic smoothbore Saiga carbines.

NcStar MPR45 Backup mount.Name: mount_all_ncstar_mpr45
NcStar MPR45 Backup mount.Description: Universal mount by NcStar that allows installing the auxiliary sight at 45 degrees angle.

Izhmash 5.45x39 АК-74 muzzle brake & com.Name: muzzle_ak74_izhmash_std_545x39
Izhmash 5.45x39 АК-74 muzzle brake & com.Description: Standard Izhmash-produced muzzle brake and compensator for АК-74 and weapon systems based on it.

Zenit DTK-1 7.62x39 & 5.45x39 muzzle bra.Name: muzzle_ak_zenit_dtk1_762x39_545x39
Zenit DTK-1 7.62x39 & 5.45x39 muzzle bra.Description: Muzzle brake compensator DTK-1 by Zenit is designed for installation on 7.62x39 and 5.45x39 AK-based weapon systems. Reduces recoil and counters the barrel climb. The crown on the DTK nose is meant for breaking of tempered glass. 24x1.5 mm threading. ©Zenit

Izhmash AK bakelite pistol grip (6P4 Sb..Name: pistolgrip_ak_izhmash_ak74_bakelit
Izhmash AK bakelite pistol grip (6P4 Sb..Description: Izhmash bakelite pistol grip for AK and compatible weapon systems.

Izhmash AK polymer pistol grip (6P1 Sb.8.Name: pistolgrip_ak_izhmash_ak74_plastic
Izhmash AK polymer pistol grip (6P1 Sb.8.Description: Izhmash polymer pistol grip for AK and compatibles, designed to replace the old bakelite grip.

Zenit RK-3 AK pistol grip.Name: pistolgrip_ak_zenit_rk3
Zenit RK-3 AK pistol grip.Description: RK-3 Classica anatomic pistol grip features built-in hermetically sealed battery storage compartment and is designed for installation as replacement of standard AK pistol grip.©Zenit

Izhmash АК-74 dust cover (6P1 0-1).Name: reciever_ak74_izhmash_ak74_std
Izhmash АК-74 dust cover (6P1 0-1).Description: Standard АК-74 top dust cover by Izhmash.

Zenit B-33 dust cover for АК-74.Name: reciever_ak_zenit_b33
Zenit B-33 dust cover for АК-74.Description: B-33 dust cover with integrated Picatinny rail is compatible with all models of Kalashnikov automatic rifles and carbines based on AK system. Allows installation of all Picatinny-mountable sights, ensuring the consistency of median aimpoint even after repeated removal and replacement of dust cover. © Zenit

AK-74 Standard Rearsight (6P1 Sb.2).Name: sight_rear_ak_izhmash_ak74_std
AK-74 Standard Rearsight (6P1 Sb.2).Description: Standard АК-74 rear sight manufactured by Izhmash.

Izhmash polymer АК-74 stock (6P20 Sb.7).Name: stock_ak74_izhmash_ak74_std_plastic
Izhmash polymer АК-74 stock (6P20 Sb.7).Description: Polymer АК-74 stock produced by Izhmash which replaced the wooden one.

Izhmash wooden АК-74 stock (6P20 Sb.5).Name: stock_ak74_izhmash_ak74_std_wood
Izhmash wooden АК-74 stock (6P20 Sb.5).Description: Standard wooden АК-74 stock produced by Izhmash.

ME adapter for АК.Name: stock_ak_utg_sfs_adapter
ME adapter for АК.Description: Adapter for installation of telescopic stock buffer tubes on AKs with non-folding stocks.

Colt buffer tube.Name: stock_ar15_colt_stock_tube_std
Colt buffer tube.Description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, 4-position, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine.

Tactica Tula TT01 Rearsight Weaver Adapt.Name: sight_rear_ak_tactica_tula_tt01
Tactica Tula TT01 Rearsight Weaver Adapt.Description: Rear sight adapter ТТ01, designed by Tactica Tula company for AK. Installed in place of a standard sight, and allows to use it if no alternative sight is installed.

6L20 30-round 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Name: mag_ak74_izhmash_6L20_545x39_30
6L20 30-round 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Description: 30-round bakelite Izhmash 6L20 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems.

6L18 45-round 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Name: mag_ak74_izhmash_6L18_545x39_45
6L18 45-round 5.45x39 magazine for АК-74.Description: 45-round bakelite Izhmash 6L26 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for АК-74 and compatible systems. Also a standard issue RPK-74 magazine.

TGP-A 5.45x39 muzzle device/suppressor.Name: silencer_ak74_spectehnika_tgpa_545x39
TGP-A 5.45x39 muzzle device/suppressor.Description: Tactical muzzle device/suppressor TGP-A, manufactured by State R&D Agency "Special devices and Comms" for AK-based 5.45x39 automatic rifles.

7.62x39 mm PS.Name: patron_762x39_PS
7.62x39 mm PS.Description: 7.62x39 mm PS (Index GAU - 57-N-231) - cartridge with bullet PS with steel core

40 mm VOG-25.Name: 40 VOG-25
40 mm VOG-25.Description: 40 mm VOG grenade launcher fragmentation round

Pistol case.Name: Чемодан
Pistol case.Description: The case for pistol and ammo storage. Features a reliable locking mechanism that requires a key.

Dorm room 118 Key.Name: Ключ от комнаты в общаге
Dorm room 118 Key.Description: A dorm room key with 118 tag on it.

AA Battery.Name: item_battery_aa
AA Battery.Description: AA Battery, used over a wide array of consumer devices.

D Size Battery.Name: item_battery_d
D Size Battery.Description: D (also R20, 373, Mono, UM) - one of the standard sizes for multipurpose batteries, used in the most energy-consuming portable electric devices like portable stereos, radiosets, GM counters, and powerful hand lights.

Geiger-Muller counter.Name: item_geiger_counter
Geiger-Muller counter.Description: Gas discharge device for an automatic count of detected ionizing particles.

Can of pacific saury.Name: item_food_konserva_fish
Can of pacific saury.Description: Smoked pacific saury in a tin can offers some easily digestible protein and aliphatic acid, making it a nice addition to the ration.

Zibbo lighter.Name: quest_zibbo_gold
Zibbo lighter.Description: Metal Zibbo gasoline lighter, renowned for being reliable and windproof.

Broken GPhone.Name: phone
Broken GPhone.Description: GPhone 9s - one of the previous generations of the famous smartphone model. Shattered beyond repair.

Euros.Name: Евро
Euros.Description: Several notes of the EU currency

P226R 9x19 pistol.Name: weapon_sig_p226r_9x19
P226R 9x19 pistol.Description: The SIG Sauer P226R is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer, a standard service weapon of Navy SEALs. Chambered for the 9x19mm Parabellum, features a Picatinny rail mount on the underside of a frame.

9x19 mm Pst gzh.Name: patron_9x19_PST_gzh
9x19 mm Pst gzh.Description: 9x19 mm Pst gzh round. Steel core bullet. Developed by TSNIITOCHMASH in the early 90s. Bullet weight — 5,4 g, muzzle velocity — 445—470 m/s. It outperforms the commercially available 9×19 mm Parabellum ordnance and corresponds to the more powerful 9×19 mm NATO army rounds (9×19 +P). The bullet hits through 4 mm plate of St.3 steel at distance of 55 m.

Black polymer Sig Sauer pistol grip for.Name: pistolgrip_p226_sig_p226_std
Black polymer Sig Sauer pistol grip for.Description: Standard black polymer Sig Sauer pistol grip for P226. Manufacturer Part Code: GRIP226BLKPOL

SIG Sauer P226R 9x19 pistol slide.Name: reciever_p226_sig_p226r_std
SIG Sauer P226R 9x19 pistol slide.Description: Blued SIG Sauer Mk25 slide for 9x19 P226.

Sig Sauer Standard Frontsight.Name: sight_front_p226_sig_p226r_std
Sig Sauer Standard Frontsight.Description: Standard frontsight for P226. Manufacturer Part Code: SIGHTCONTRASTFR

Sig Sauer P226 Standard Rearsight.Name: sight_rear_p226_sig_p226r_std
Sig Sauer P226 Standard Rearsight.Description: Standard Sig Sauer Rearsight for P226. Manufacturer Part Code: CONTRASTREAR8

MP-153 12ga semi-automatic shotgun.Name: weapon_izhmeh_mr153_12g
MP-153 12ga semi-automatic shotgun.Description: Smoothbore multi-shot MP-153 shotgun, produced by Izhmekh. Reliable and practical hunting and self-defence weapon.

750 mm barrel for MP-153 12ga shotgun.Name: barrel_mr153_750mm
750 mm barrel for MP-153 12ga shotgun.Description: Standard serially produced barrel for МР-153 shotgun, 750 mm long for 12ga shells.

Izhmekh МP-153 Polymer stock.Name: handguard_mr153_izhmeh_polymer
Izhmekh МP-153 Polymer stock.Description: Standard Izhmekh-manufactured polymer stock for MP-153 shotgun.

X400 tactical flashlight.Name: tactical_all_surefire_x400_vis_laser
X400 tactical flashlight.Description: SureFire X400 combined LED and red laser Weapon Light.

5.45x39 mm BP.Name: patron_545x39_BP
5.45x39 mm BP.Description: 5.45x39 mm BP (Index GRAU - 7N22) - Cartridge with armor-piercing bullet BP.

5.45x39 mm BS.Name: patron_545x39_BS
5.45x39 mm BS.Description: 5.45x39 mm BS (Index GRAU - 7N24) - a cartridge with a special armor-piercing bullet BS. The cartridge is intended for the destruction of manpower, including equipped with personal body armor, and light armored vehicles.

5.45x39 mm BT.Name: patron_545x39_BT
5.45x39 mm BT.Description: 5.45x39 mm BT (GRAU index - 7BT4) - cartridge with armor-piercing tracer bullet BT. It is intended for the destruction of manpower, including equipped with personal body armor, fire adjustments and target designation.

5.45x39 mm FMJ.Name: patron_545x39_FMJ
5.45x39 mm FMJ.Description: 5.45x39 mm FMJ sport cartridge for target practice. 2-part bullet, bimetal jacket.

5.45x39 mm HP.Name: patron_545x39_HP
5.45x39 mm HP.Description: 5.45x39 mm HP Sport cartridge for target shooting. 2-part bullet with bimetal jacket and lead core.

5.45x39 mm PP.Name: patron_545x39_PP
5.45x39 mm PP.Description: 5.45x39 mm PP (Index GRAU - 7Н10) - cartridge with a bullet of increased penetration with a steel thermally strengthened core.

5.45x39 mm PRS.Name: patron_545x39_PRS
5.45x39 mm PRS.Description: 5.45x39 mm PRS cartridge with reduced ricochet bullet (developed for needs of special forces and law enforcement).

5.45x39 mm PS.Name: patron_545x39_PS
5.45x39 mm PS.Description: 5.45x39 mm PS (Index GRAU - 7Н6) - cartridge with steel core PS bullet.

5.45x39 mm SP.Name: patron_545x39_SP
5.45x39 mm SP.Description: 5.45x39 mm SP Sporting cartridge for target practice.

5.45x39 mm T.Name: patron_545x39_T
5.45x39 mm T.Description: 5.45x39 mm T (GRAU Index - 7T3) - a cartridge with a tracer bullet T. It is intended for target designation and adjustment of fire during shooting, as well as for the destruction of manpower.

5.45x39 mm US.Name: patron_545x39_US
5.45x39 mm US.Description: 5.45x39 mm US (GRAU-7U1 index) is a cartridge with a low-speed US bullet.

PB 9x18PM silenced pistol.Name: weapon_tochmash_pb_9x18pm
PB 9x18PM silenced pistol.Description: PB silenced pistol (GRAU Index 6P9) was designed for the purposes of army reconnaissance groups and USSR KGB personnel and introduced into service in 1967. Still operated nowadays by FSB special forces and internal troops of Ministry of Internal Affairs.

TSNIITOCHMASH bakelite PB side grips.Name: pistolgrip_pb_tochmash_pb_std
TSNIITOCHMASH bakelite PB side grips.Description: Standard issue PB bakelite side grips.

Mystery Ranch Terraplane Backpack.Name: endlessBackpack
Mystery Ranch Terraplane Backpack.Description: This durable, made with 500 Cordura, spacious, comfortable to wear and well-organized extra large backpack can hold half of Tarkov and still have some space left.

Scav Backpack.Name: backpack_wild
Scav Backpack.Description: Cheap replica of some 3-day assault pack with MOLLE attachment system, adapted and enhanced by owner as much as his creativity allowed. Does not offer much comfort, and volume is far lower than that of a proper 3-day pack, but it's still a backpack alright.

Transformer Bag.Name: tactical_backpack
Transformer Bag.Description: A rather spacious messenger bag, large enough to fit a lunchbox, laptop and some papers - or a small emergency survival kit. Its transformable sling and universal size allow it to be worn both as bag and a compact backpack.

Noveske KX3 5.56x45 flash hider.Name: muzzle_ar15_noveske_kx3_556x45
Noveske KX3 5.56x45 flash hider.Description: The Noveske KX3 Flash hider, aka the Burning Pig, is designed to increase reliability in short-barreled members of AR-15 family by increasing backpressure and directing the muzzle blast forward of the shooter. Although originally designed for short-barreled AR-15s, it will work on any barrel length and have since been introduced for a variety of mounts. This particular KX3 may be used on 5.56mm barrels with 1/2x28 threading.

Hensoldt FF 4-16x56 scope.Name: scope_34mm_hensoldt_zf_4_16x56_ff
Hensoldt FF 4-16x56 scope.Description: Hensoldt FF 4-16x56 telescopic sight was developed to deliver maximum performance and high adjustment ranges while maintaining a short optical system. With increased transparency in the blue spectral range and adjustable reticle light it is particularly comfortable under low-light conditions. The FF version of the scope has the reticle placed in the first image plane, thus, the reticle pattern is also magnified when the magnification is changed. This makes it possible to determine the distance using the MIL-DOT without having to calculate.

Badger Ordnance Tactical Charging Handle.Name: charge_ar15_badger_ordnance_tactical_latch
Badger Ordnance Tactical Charging Handle.Description: The Badger Ordnance Tactical Charging Handle is optimized for use with Mil Spec AR-15/M16/M4 platform rifles and features preinstalled popular Gen I Tactical Latch of the same company. All components are machined from 6061 Alloy and Mil Spec Type III Hardcoat Anodized.

Sight Mount Sig 220-239 rear sight beari.Name: sight_rear_p226_sight_mount_220-239
Sight Mount Sig 220-239 rear sight beari.Description: 220-239 rear sight bearing produced by Sight Mount company for Sig Sauer 220, 226, 227, 229, 239 pistols. It is installed as a replacement of the standard rear sight and allows to use it if no scope is installed.

KAC QD Compensator 5.56x45.Name: muzzle_ar15_kac_qd_compensator_556x45
KAC QD Compensator 5.56x45.Description: The KAC 5.56 QD muzzle compensator/flash hider is an effective flash suppressor that also serves as a platform for attaching a KAC quick detach QDSS-NT4 sound suppressor. Installed on weapons based on AR-15/M16/M4.

Izhmash SV-98 bipod.Name: bipod_sv-98_izhmash_bipod_std
Izhmash SV-98 bipod.Description: Standard SV-98 bipod. Folded into the forestock when not used.

Windham Weaponry Rail Gas Block.Name: gas_block_ar15_windham_weaponry_rail_gas_block
Windham Weaponry Rail Gas Block.Description: Installed as replacement to standard AR-15-based weapons gas block, it adds a Picatinny rail that allows installing your own accessory front sight.

MK12 Low Profile Gas Block.Name: gas_block_ar15_dd_mk12_low_profile
MK12 Low Profile Gas Block.Description: The MK12 Gas Block is only compatible with the RIS II (M4A1 & MK18) family of rail systems manufactured by Daniel Defense. It is not compatible with any other Daniel Defense rail system. This is due to various clearance issues. This only applies to rail system lengths that would completely shroud the gas block. If you are mounting the gas block to the barrel without being shrouded by the rail system, then this does not apply. In that case, it will fit as long as barrel diameter is .750.

MOE Carbine stock.Name: stock_ar15_magpul_moe_carbine_blk
MOE Carbine stock.Description: Drop-in replacement buttstock for AR15/M16 carbines by Magpul Original Equipment. Uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear.

Eotech 553 holographic sight.Name: scope_all_eotech_553
Eotech 553 holographic sight.Description: Eotech 553 holographic collimator sight. Thanks to design features it can be used with a wide range of weapons even with non-folding sights. Compatible with night vision devices by the means of NV reticle mode. Utilized by US SOCOM as a primary sight for operations in confined spaces.

Walther MRS reflex sight.Name: scope_all_walther_mrs
Walther MRS reflex sight.Description: Reflex Walther Multi-Reticle Point Sight features 2 dots and 2 reticles with adjustable brightness levels. Cheap, accurate (but has to zeroed every time the reticle type is switched), compact and offers good battery life - but not too sturdy and reliable.

OKP-7 reflex sight.Name: scope_dovetail_ekb_okp7_dovetail
OKP-7 reflex sight.Description: The original design of OKP sights allows firing from unstable positions in rapidly changing conditions, reduces the operator fatigue, and, if necessary, allows unhindered use of base mechanical sights. The key feature of this sight is a rimless reflector attachment that doesn't block any field of fire sections; instead, reflector is protected by thin and durable visor that is almost un-noticeable when firing. This variant is installed on the dovetail type mount.

F-1 Hand grenade.Name: weapon_grenade_f1
F-1 Hand grenade.Description: The F-1 hand grenade (GRAU Index 57-G-721) is an anti-personnel fragmentation defensive grenade, designed for neutralizing enemy personnel in defensive combat. Due to a significantly effective fragmentation radius, it should only be thrown from behind hard cover, such as a concrete wall, APC, or tank.

DI ECS FDE pistol grip for AR-15 based s.Name: pistolgrip_ar15_damage_industries_ecs_fde
DI ECS FDE pistol grip for AR-15 based s.Description: ECS polymer pistol grip can be installed at any weapon compatible with AR-15 grips. The only difference from standard one is color.

TT pistol 7.62x25 TT.Name: weapon_toz_tt_762x25tt
TT pistol 7.62x25 TT.Description: A legendary pistol. It has seen numerous military conflicts and is still being in service in certain spots of our planet, in one modification or another. This one is a classic TT-33, the most mass-produced version. It features Browning short-recoil tilting-barrel system, but very different otherwise - purposefully simple, single-action, no safety measures except half-cock notch, it is able to withstand horrible operating abuse. Thanks to the powerful 7.62x25 cartridge and relatively long barrel, TT boasts high muzzle velocity, penetration, and impressive accuracy, even over long distances.

Homespun 121mm 7.62x25 ТТ barrel with th.Name: barrel_tt_116mm_762x25tt_threaded
Homespun 121mm 7.62x25 ТТ barrel with th.Description: Homespun barrel for TT pistol, with threading for silencer installation.

Standard TT side grips.Name: pistolgrip_tt_toz_tt_std
Standard TT side grips.Description: Standard post-war issue TT pistol side grips.

Makeshift 7.62x25 ТТ silencer.Name: silencer_tt_custom_noname_762x25tt
Makeshift 7.62x25 ТТ silencer.Description: Makeshift silencer for TT with homespun barrel. Install and operate at your own discretion.

tt-105 7.62x25 ТТ Magazine.Name: mag_tt_toz_std_762x25tt_8
tt-105 7.62x25 ТТ Magazine.Description: Standard late issue 8-round magazine for TT pistol without lanyard ring.

AN/PVS-14 Night Vision Monocular.Name: nvg_pvs_14
AN/PVS-14 Night Vision Monocular.Description:
AN/PVS-14 Monocular Night Vision Device.
Army/Navy Portable Visual Search device allows nighttime detection of targets on distances of up to 350m with 40°
FOV and adjustable brightness.

Scav Vest.Name: wild_vest
Scav Vest.Description: A fisherman's vest can more or less replace the chest rig, if the need is pressing enough.

Baseball cap.Name: cap
Baseball cap.Description: Baseball cap, the most basic device for glare protection.

Balaclava.Name: balaclava
Balaclava.Description: A definitive black woolen balaclava is not only a head-warmer but soul-warmer too for anyone who is too modest for public heroic deeds.

Beanie.Name: knitcap
Beanie.Description: Warm knitted beanie, traditionally made for skiers but worn by everyone.

Lower half-mask.Name: mask
Lower half-mask.Description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member.

Car battery.Name: car_battery
Car battery.Description: A typical 12 V, 51 Ah lead-acid car batteries are in quite a demand with traders, who resell them in the areas that have been left without power supply.

Chainlet.Name: chain
Chainlet.Description: A small piece of jewelry worn around the neck. Depending on the materials and weight, can be quite valuable even now.

Golden neck chain.Name: chain_gold
Golden neck chain.Description: Golden neck chain is bound to be a rather profitable piece of jewelry to find.

Apollon Soyuz cigarettes.Name: cigarettes_soyuz_apollo
Apollon Soyuz cigarettes.Description: Apollon Soyuz cigarettes will take you to the stars from a cough when you inhale them.

Malboro Cigarettes.Name: cigarettes_malboro
Malboro Cigarettes.Description: Malboro Cigarettes are a big hit with the better-off part of the local smoking populace.

Wilston cigarettes.Name: cigarettes_wilston
Wilston cigarettes.Description: The image of a typical street punk would not be complete without Wilston cigarettes.

Strike Cigarettes.Name: cigarettes_strike
Strike Cigarettes.Description: Strike Cigarettes can be sold off to traders for their personal use later.

Condensed milk.Name: condensed_milk
Condensed milk.Description: Condensed milk that once was a part of field ration for the Union soldiers in Civil War have since reached unprecedented popularity in post-Soviet countries, becoming almost a staple product. Canned, it can be stored for decades and remain just as sweet, tasty and nutritious.

CPU Fan.Name: cooler_fan
CPU Fan.Description: In conditions of total deficiency of elementary goods and conveniences, CPU cooling fans come in handy for crafty locals - wind power generators made from them charge radios, they are used as household fans, and even serve as vent intakes, replacing native heavy blades.

PC CPU.Name: CPU
PC CPU.Description: PC central processing units, in lack of properly working computers, have found their purpose as a construction material for makeshift antenna reflector-type parasites.

DVD drive.Name: dvd_drive
DVD drive.Description: Magnets, laser diodes, and lenses make PC DVD drives a valuable resource for all sorts of makeshift survivor geekery, including motion detectors and designators.

Horse figurine.Name: horse_figurine
Horse figurine.Description: Horrendously kitsch horse figurine is useless in Tarkov - just as anywhere else - but somewhere out there, there are dealers still willing to buy such things. Something is not right about this.

Insulating tape.Name: insulation_tape
Insulating tape.Description: Although insulating tape is primarily intended for insulation of wires, its practical application is limited only by the creativity of its owner. Most typical cases include minor maintenance, holding together split parts, binding some stuff together and anti-slip wrapping of handles.

Classic matches.Name: matches
Classic matches.Description: A matchbox full of safety matches. Lighters are more reliable and easier to use, but that's exactly why everybody tries to keep them hidden when asked for a light.

RAM.Name: ram_module
RAM.Description: Old RAM is a primary source of IC chips for various microcontroller purposes of the locals.

Duct tape.Name: ducttape
Duct tape.Description: Duct tape is a universal tool to fix in one place something that moves, but shouldn't.

Power supply unit.Name: power_supply_unit
Power supply unit.Description: PC power supply unit can be easily converted from powering PCs to a universal charger for all kinds of low-voltage rechargeable batteries and devices.

Bolts.Name: screw_bolts
Bolts.Description: Bolts, together with nuts, are used to fasten things in place.

Screw nut.Name: screw_nuts
Screw nut.Description: Just a commonplace screw nut, with no apparent use.

Toothpaste.Name: toothpaste
Toothpaste.Description: Not that teeth hygiene was essential in the city now, but why not, if a chance is here.

Graphics card.Name: video_card
Graphics card.Description: Graphics card is just as good source of electronic components as anything else - fans, GPUs, IC, whatever.

T-Shaped Plug.Name: tplug
T-Shaped Plug.Description: A T-shaped splitter for the wall power outlet.

Rye croutons.Name: borodinskiye
Rye croutons.Description: Croutons from traditional Russian sourdough rye Borodinskiy bread.

Humpback salmon.Name: humpback
Humpback salmon.Description: Can of humpback salmon, tasty source of aliphatic acids and niacin.

Can of green peas.Name: peas
Can of green peas.Description: Can of green peas, rich in vitamins and selenium, which makes it especially valuable in the dubious environmental conditions of Norvinsk region.

Can of beef stew.Name: canned_beef
Can of beef stew.Description: Canned beef stew, commonly referred to as tushonka, can be stored for years, thus rivaling condensed milk in importance as military and tourist food supply.

Squash spread.Name: squashspread
Squash spread.Description: Can of squash spread, a little vegetable treasure that goes well with almost anything and boasts an impressive set of vitamins and minerals.

Pack of oat flakes.Name: oatmeal
Pack of oat flakes.Description: Package of oat flakes, primary component of healthy porridge for breakfast.

Can of herring.Name: herring
Can of herring.Description: Canned herring, probably the lightest meal among canned fish, is rich with calcium and magnesium.

Can of delicious beef stew.Name: beefstew
Can of delicious beef stew.Description: Canned beef stew, commonly referred to as tushonka, can be stored for years, thus rivaling condensed milk in importance as military and tourist food supply.

7.62x25mm TT FMJ43.Name: patron_762x25tt_FMJ43
7.62x25mm TT FMJ43.Description: 7.62x25mm TT sport-hunting round with FMJ43 bullet.

7.62x25mm TT LRN.Name: patron_762x25tt_LRN
7.62x25mm TT LRN.Description: 7.62x25mm TT sport-hunting round with LRN bullet.

7.62x25mm TT LRNPC.Name: patron_762x25tt_LRNPC
7.62x25mm TT LRNPC.Description: 7.62x25mm TT sport-hunting round with LRNPC bullet.

7.62x25mm TT P gl.Name: patron_762x25tt_P_Gl
7.62x25mm TT P gl.Description: 7.62x25mm TT (Index GAU - 57-N-132) - cartridge with bullet P, brass.

7.62x25mm TT Pst gzh.Name: patron_762x25tt_Pst_gzh
7.62x25mm TT Pst gzh.Description: 7.62x25mm TT (Index GAU - 57-N-134S) - cartridge with a bullet with steel core Pst, steel sleeve.

7.62x25mm TT PT gzh.Name: patron_762x25tt_T_Gzh
7.62x25mm TT PT gzh.Description: 7.62x25mm TT Pt gzh (Index GAU - 57-T-132) - cartridge with tracer bullet, brass.

9x18 mm PM 9 BZT gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_BZT_gzh
9x18 mm PM 9 BZT gzh.Description: 9x18 mm PM 9 BZT gzh (GRAU index - 7N15) - a cartridge with an all-metal bullet of high armor penetration, entirely made of steel.

9x18 mm PM 9 P gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_P_gzh
9x18 mm PM 9 P gzh.Description: 9x18 mm PM 9 P gzh (GAU index-57-N-181): bullet with lead core

9x18 mm PM PBM.Name: patron_9x18pm_PBM
9x18 mm PM PBM.Description: 9x18 mm PM PBM (GRAU - 7N25 index) An armor-piercing cartridge for use in small arms for a conventional 9 × 18 mm PM cartridge.

9x18 mm PM PMM.Name: patron_9x18pm_PMM
9x18 mm PM PMM.Description: 9x18 mm PM PMM (57-N-181SM, GRAU index - 7N16) is the modernization of the cartridge 9 × 18 mm PM aimed at increasing the bullet penetration ability. In the cartridge, the powder charge is increased by 30% and a new bullet in the form of a truncated cone.

9x18 mm PM PPe gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_PPE_gzh
9x18 mm PM PPe gzh.Description: 9x18 mm PM PPe gzh- round with hollow point bullet.

9x18 mm PM PPT gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_PPT_gzh
9x18 mm PM PPT gzh.Description: 9x18 mm PM PPT gzh (Index GAU - 57-T-181) - a cartridge with a tracer bullet PPT.

9x18 mm PM PRS gs.Name: patron_9x18pm_PRS_gs
9x18 mm PM PRS gs.Description: 9x18 mm PM PRS gs - cartridge with low ricochet ability (for law enforcement).

9x18 mm PM PS gs PPO.Name: patron_9x18pm_PS_gs_PPO
9x18 mm PM PS gs PPO.Description: 9x18 mm PM PS gs PPO - law enforcement ammo. Supplied for the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the FSSP and DOSAAF. Bullet with a lead core.

9x18 mm PM PSO gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_PSO_gzh
9x18 mm PM PSO gzh.Description: 9x18 mm PM PSO gzh- sporting and hunting cartridge, bullet shell with lead core.

9x18 mm PM Pst gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_PST_gzh
9x18 mm PM Pst gzh.Description: 9x18 mm PM Pst gzh (Index GAU - 57-N-181S): a bullet with a steel core, bimetallic.

9x18 mm PM PSV.Name: patron_9x18pm_PSV
9x18 mm PM PSV.Description: 9x18 mm PM PSV round with hollow point bullet.

9x18mm PM RG028 gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_RG028_gzh
9x18mm PM RG028 gzh.Description: 9x18mm PM round with enhanced penetration expanding bullet.

9x18 mm PM SP7 gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_SP7_gzh
9x18 mm PM SP7 gzh.Description: 9x18 mm PM round with enhanced stopping effect expanding bullet.

9x18 mm PM SP8 gzh.Name: patron_9x18pm_SP8_gzh
9x18 mm PM SP8 gzh.Description: 9x18 mm PM round with reduced penetration expanding bullet.

16 pcs. 9x18 PM BZHT gzh ammo box.Name: item_ammo_box_9x18pm_16_BZT_gzh
16 pcs. 9x18 PM BZHT gzh ammo box.Description: Cardboard box of 9x18 PM BZHT gzh ammo, 16 rounds.

16 pcs. 9x18 PM P gzh ammo box.Name: item_ammo_box_9x18pm_16_P_gzh
16 pcs. 9x18 PM P gzh ammo box.Description: Cardboard box of 9x18 PM P gzh ammo, 16 rounds.

16 pcs. 9x18 PM PBM ammo box.Name: item_ammo_box_9x18pm_16_PBM
16 pcs. 9x18 PM PBM ammo box.Description: Cardboard box of 9x18 PM PBM ammo, 16 rounds.

16 pcs. 9x18 PM PMM ammo box.Name: item_ammo_box_9x18pm_16_PMM

Simonov Semi-Automatic Carbine SKS 7.62x.Name: weapon_toz_sks_762x39
Simonov Semi-Automatic Carbine SKS 7.62x.Description: Soviet semi-automatic carbine designed by Sergei Simonov for 7.62x39 cartridge and known abroad as SKS-45. Immensely popular both in CIS countries and in the West, this weapon is still in active service in some countries in form of various copies and modifications. This particular specimen comes from extended storage warehouses of Tula Arms Plant and haven't yet undergo the civilian weapon normalization procedure.

Wooden stock 56-A-231 Sb.5.Name: stock_sks_toz_sks_std_wood
Wooden stock 56-A-231 Sb.5.Description: Standard-issue wooden SKS stock produced by TOZ.

Factory Plan.Name: factory plan
Factory Plan.Description: A simplified and updated copy of the factory facilities blueprint.

Alyonka chocolate bar.Name: alyonka
Alyonka chocolate bar.Description: The best known milk chocolate of post-Soviet space, sweet and creamy.

Green Ice.Name: drink_icegreen
Green Ice.Description: Sweetened green tea drink, for consumption ice-cold.

Apple juice.Name: drink_juice_apple
Apple juice.Description: Clarified and reconstituted apple juice, a bit refreshing, a bit sweet.

Grand juice.Name: drink_juice_grand
Grand juice.Description: Grand pomegranate juice, great drink for those who lack bitterness in their lives.

Vita juice.Name: drink_juice_vita
Vita juice.Description: Multifruit and multivitamin juice can be confusing tastewise, but it sure is healthy.

Max energy.Name: drink_maxenergy
Max energy.Description: Max Energy energy drink, designed like a battery, but different in contents - regular caffeine,  sugar, and flavoring.

TarCola.Name: drink_tarcola
TarCola.Description: TarCola is a widely spread cola-flavored soft drink produced, before the conflict, by a local drinks manufacturer.

Pack of milk.Name: drink_milk
Pack of milk.Description: 1L package of milk that mysteriously survived until now.

Emelya rye croutons.Name: emelya
Emelya rye croutons.Description: Emelya rye croutons with assorted flavours were a favourite snack of teens and lazy beer drinkers, but, unlike them, stayed behind.

Hot Rod.Name: hotrod
Hot Rod.Description: Hot Rod, though being the most recognizable energy drink in the world, is not much more powerful that its counterparts. The standards are the same for all.

Golden Star Balm.Name: golden_star_balm
Golden Star Balm.Description: Famous Vietnamese Golden Star Balm, also known as Cao Sao Vang is made from essential oils like Camphor, Menthol, Peppermint, Cajuput. Balm for external use: a small amount of it is applied to the sub-district and rubbing of the skin: for headache - the temples and the nape of the neck, with a cold - under the nostrils, the common cold - in the chest, back, abdomen, insect bites - on the place of bite. Precautions and special instructions: Intended for external use only.

AI-2 medikit.Name: medkit
AI-2 medikit.Description: The AI-2 medikit was developed as a standard service first aid kit for various defence and law enforcement agencies and civil defense forces of USSR. In case of all-out conflict with the use of weapons of mass destruction it should have been distributed to the population  of the affected and surrounding areas.

Vaseline.Name: vaseline
Vaseline.Description: Vaseline, or, more precisely, petroleum jelly, is a versatile ointment used for a number of purposes where its water insulation and lubrication properties are required, for instance, treating small cuts and burns, coating corrosion-prone items or lubricating gear that requires non-acidic lubricants.

Saiga 12ga ver. 10 12/76 shotgun.Name: weapon_izhmash_saiga12k_10_12g
Saiga 12ga ver. 10 12/76 shotgun.Description: Semi-automatic 12ga shotgun with folding stock and firing mechanism safety lock that only allows firing from extended stock position. Features short 430mm barrel.

SOK-12 Protection tube.Name: muzzle_saiga12_izhmash_saiga12_std_12g
SOK-12 Protection tube.Description: Standard-issue threading protection tube for SOK-12.

SOK-12 polymer handguard Sb.7-1.Name: handguard_saiga12_izhmash_saiga12k_10_std
SOK-12 polymer handguard Sb.7-1.Description: The Sb.7-1 is a standard polymer handguard with sling swivel installed on SOK-12 and SOK-12S.

Sb.5 5-round 12/76 magazine for SOK-12 a.Description: 5-round Sb.5 polymer plastic magazine for SOK-12 and compatible weapons, intended for use with 12/76  or 12/70 shells.

Yarygin MP-443 Grach 9x19 pistol.Name: weapon_izhmeh_mp443_9x19
Yarygin MP-443 Grach 9x19 pistol.Description: Russian-produced semiautomatic 9x19 pistol, a service weapon of the Russian army, special forces of Ministry of internal affairs and other defense and law enforcement agencies.

Polymer Izhmekh pistol grip for MP-443.Name: pistolgrip_mp443_izmeh_mp443_std
Polymer Izhmekh pistol grip for MP-443.Description: Standard service pistol grip for MP-443 manufactured by Izhmekh.

B-8 mount.Name: mount_mp443_zenit_b8
B-8 mount.Description: B-8 rail mount is installed on Yarygin pistol (MP-443 Grach and its civilian version MP-446 Viking) for use with additional attachments, e.g. 2KS Klesch Mini tactical laser flashlight.

Zenit-Belomo PSO 1M2-1 4x24 scope.Name: scope_dovetail_belomo_pso_1m2-1_4×24
Zenit-Belomo PSO 1M2-1 4x24 scope.Description: Military grade sniper optical scope PSO 1M2-1, manufactured by Zenit-Belomo. This optical scope is designed for precision sight fire with Special Sniper Rifle (VSS) and Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD) on the variety of targets with 4x magnification and 6 degree FOV.

Burris FastFire Weaver Base.Name: mount_all_burris_fast_fire_weaver

Burris FastFire 3 Reflex Sight.Name: scope_base_burris_fast_fire_3
Burris FastFire 3 Reflex Sight.Description: Light  and  tough,  the  FastFire  series  puts an  unmistakable,  bright  red  dot  on  your target  to  give  you  an  immediate  speed and  accuracy  advantage.  Can  be  used  as  a  primary sight or paired on top of an existing sight.

Printer paper.Name: copy_paper

PM (t) 9x18PM pistol.Name: weapon_izhmeh_pm_treaded_9x18pm
PM (t) 9x18PM pistol.Description: A semi-mythical PM with extended barrel and suppressor mount threading. Some claim it was a limited series manufactured in Bulgaria, others insist on DDR, and some are even prone to think of it as a handcrafted upgrade. How did it end up in the Norvinsk region, no living soul can tell.

Customs plan.Name: customs plan
Customs plan.Description: A plan of the vast Customs premises, maybe not the most up-to date, but still better than nothing.

9x39 mm SP-5.Name: patron_9x39_sp5
9x39 mm SP-5.Description: A sniper cartridge manufactured with high accuracy, has a bullet with a steel core. To engage targets protected by 1-3 class armor.

9x39 mm SP-6.Name: patron_9x39_sp6
9x39 mm SP-6.Description: Armor-piercing modification of the cartridge SP-5. It is a cartridge with a half-shell bullet with a core of high-carbon steel. It allows you to confidently hit targets protected by bulletproof vests up to 4 class of protection inclusive at a distance of up to 50 meters.

B-3 mount.Name: mount_vss_zenit_b3
B-3 mount.Description: B-3 mounts are fixed on the VSS or VAL suppressor to form a Picatinny rail for installation of additional weapon equipment.

Door key.Name: factory pump station

ELCAN SpecterDR 1x/4x Scope.Name: scope_all_elcan_specter_dr_1-4
ELCAN SpecterDR 1x/4x Scope.Description: The SpecterDR (Dual Role) 1x/4x scope from Specter scope series designed by ELCAN has marked a breakthrough in the optic sight development by becoming the first variable scope that truly has two work modes, switching from 4x magnification to 1x in one touch.

UMTBS 6sh112 Scout-Sniper.Description: Universal Modular transport-combat system (UMTBS) "Scout-sniper" is officially part of the equipment of the armed forces of the Russian Federation. The vest is designed with modular approach in several versions for specific combat tasks. This system includes the vest base, various purpose pouches and backpacks. Due to the fact that the vest is based on MOLLE system, it can be used with various compatible pouches beyond those included into the kit. The belt system has soft bumper stabs, and its inside is made from breathing materials.

ANA Tactical Alpha chest rig.Name: ana_tactical

The combination of integrated pouches and MOLLE straps provides the means of carrying a large number of necessary equipment. The vest is designed as a classic chest rig. In this type of vests all the gear is located in the front and side parts, while back part is comprised of adjustment belts and straps.

Motor Controller.Name: item_barter_electr_controller3
Motor Controller.Description: Motor controllers have been developed for use on weapons stations or main battle tanks. The system power, I/O, performance and assembly have been designed for the most demanding dynamics and precision requirements and can be easily modified. Motor controller includes EMI filtering, power electronics, embedded system software, control algorithm, a common service tool, and the electrical interfaces required.

Single-axis Fiber Optic Gyroscope.Name: item_barter_electr_gyroscope2
Single-axis Fiber Optic Gyroscope.Description:
Single and dual-axis Fiber Optic Gyroscopes (FOG) have been developed for high-performance military applications and are of the highest quality. The FOGs provide compensated yaw rates to the synchronous Integrated Bus for Intelligent Sensors (IBIS) or the asynchronous RS-422 interface.

Developed for use in particularly harsh environments, the gyroscopes can withstand extreme shock and vibration in accordance with MIL-STD-810 ground mobile use, are fully digitized, include on-line BIT, and have no moving parts.

DS Arms SA-58 7.62x51.Description: SA-58 OSW (Operations Specialist Weapon) manufactured by American company DSA (David Selvaggio Arms) is a legal copy of the FAL, its made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. It may come with a different barrel length, an aluminum-alloy lower receiver, and improved Glass-filled Nylon furniture. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 750 rounds/minute. The DSA-58 can use any metric-measurement FAL magazines.

GLOCK 18C 9x19 pistol.Description: The Glock 18 is a selective-fire variant of the Glock 17. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round-capacity magazine, although other magazines from the Glock 17 can be used, with available capacities of 10, 17, or 19 rounds. It has a keyhole opening cut into the forward portion of the slide, similar to the opening on the Glock long-slide models, although the Glock 18 has a standard-length slide. The keyhole opening provides an area to allow the four, progressively larger (from back to front) compensator cuts machined into the barrel to vent the propellant gases upwards, affording more control over the rapid-firing machine pistol.

TT pistol 7.62x25 TT Gold.Name: weapon_toz_tt_762x25tt_gold
TT pistol 7.62x25 TT Gold.Description: A legendary pistol. It has seen numerous military conflicts and is still being in service in the certain spots of our planet, in one modification or another. This one is a classic TT-33, the most mass-produced version. It features Browning short-recoil tilting-barrel system, but very different otherwise - purposefully simple, single-action, no safety measures except half cock notch, it is able to withstand horrible operating abuse. Thanks to powerful 7.62x25 cartridge and relatively long barrel, TT boasts high muzzle velocity, penetration and impressive accuracy, even over long distances. Special gold edition.

12x70 RIP.Description: RIP (Radically Invasive Projectile) ammunition is a devastatingly effective choice for the anti-personnel use. This 12 cal ammo features a precision-machined solid copper lead-free projectile designed to produce huge damage to body.

5.56x45mm Warmage.Name: patron_556x45_varmageddon

5.45x39 mm 7N39 \"Igolnik\".Name: patron_545x39_7n39
5.45x39 mm 7N39 \"Igolnik\".Description: An experimental cartridge with an armor piercing bullet. The core of the bullet is peaked from an alloy of tungsten carbide (92%) and cobalt (8%), produced by pressing metal powders, followed by sintering.

9x39 mm 7N9 SPP.Name: patron_9x39_spp
9x39 mm 7N9 SPP.Description: Further modernization of the SP-5 cartridge. The SPP bullet consists of a bimetallic shell with a truncated tip and a combined core - a bare steel core at the head of the bullet and a lead core behind it.

9x39 mm 7N12 BP.Name: patron_9x39_bp
9x39 mm 7N12 BP.Description: To replace the cartridge "SP-6" Tula ammo plant has developed cartridge with an armor-piercing bullet "BP". The cartridge is intended to eliminate manpower protected by personal protective equipment up to the 5th grade of protection. The BP bullet consists of a bimetallic shell with a truncated tip, a steel core and a lead jacket.

Option 6B5-16 is designed to protect against fragments and bullets of fire arms (3rd class protection, titanium). Also has several pouches for magazines and other equipment.

Propital.Name: Propital

Increases metabolism, health and vitality. It has long-term side effects. Permitted to use only by medical officers and paramedics.

Combat stimulant injector SJ1 TGLabs.Name: SJ1_TGLabs

Combat stimulant injector SJ6 TGLabs.Name: SJ6_TGLabs
Combat stimulant injector SJ6 TGLabs.Description: Combat stimulant. It is used to increase the body abilities before combat. Stimulant is allowed to use by the special forces units. Developed by Terra Group Labs, marked as SJ6. Has side effects

FN P90 5.7x28 submachinegun.Name: weapon_fn_p90_57x28
FN P90 5.7x28 submachinegun.Description: The FN P90, also known as the FN Project 1990, is a compact personal defense weapon (PDW) designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. Created in response to NATO requests for a replacement for 9×19mm Parabellum firearms, the P90 was designed as a compact but powerful firearm for vehicle crews, operators of crew-served weapons, support personnel, special forces, and counter-terrorist groups.

5.7x28 mm R37.F.Name: patron_57x28_r37f
5.7x28 mm R37.F.Description:
Ready for the next level of FN 57 Defense Ammo from R&R Weapon Systems: R37.F. This FN 57 Defense Ammo has a superior ballistic profile, achieving velocities from 2100/fps up to 2400/fps. Ballistic performance of the R37.F is unique by fragmenting into three razor sharp petals which penetrate 5-7 inche while the base travels 15-17 inches after passing through 4 layers of denim.

This FN 57 Defense Ammo is a 37 grain Fragmenting Copper Hollow Point round. It is CNC Machined pure monolithic copper 99.5%. The projectile is a Violently expanding/fragmenting top with a deep penetrating base. The base penetration is between 15-17 inches, and the petal penetration travels between 5-7 inches in ballistic gel after passing through 4 layers of denim. If you are looking for one of the most devastating FN 5.7 Defense Ammo available for the FN 5.7 and PS90 look no further.

5.7x28 mm R37.X.Name: patron_57x28_r37x
5.7x28 mm R37.X.Description:
Ready for the next level of FN 57 Defense Ammo from R&R Weapon Systems: R37.X. This FN 57 Defense Ammo has a superior ballistic profile, achieving velocities from 2100/fps up to 2400/fps. Ballistic performance of the R37.X is unique by expanding into a three tip star shape which has razor sharp petals. This expanded razor sharp projectile travels 12-15 inches after passing through 4 layers of denim.

This FN 57 Defense Ammo is a 37 grain Expanding Copper Hollow Point round. It is CNC Machined pure monolithic copper 99.5%. The projectile is a hollow point that expands to inflict serious damage. If you are looking for one of the most devastating FN 57 Defense Ammo available for the FN 5.7 and PS90 look no further.

The raid backpack 6Sh118 is a set of combat equipment of the 2nd generation "Ratnik" gear kit.
The 6Sh118 tactical army backpack is a modernization of the model of the raid backpack called 6B38 Permyachka. The raid 6Sh118 backpack is an element of individual military equipment of military personnel, designed to carry fire support equipment, weapons, ammunition, elements of mountain equipment, as well as his personal belongings. The Drop-In 2-Stage Trigger serves as an aid to long range precision marksmanship. The E2 bolt and gas system provides superior reliability in function whether suppressed or unsuppressed.

3-(b-TG).Name: 3-(b-TG)
3-(b-TG).Description: Combat drug. It has a stimulating effect on the Central nervous system. Increases perception and attention. It can slightly improve strength indicators, due to more powerful signals to the muscles. The active substance 3-(b-Phenylisopropyl)-sydnonimine hydrochloride. Only military doctors and paramedics are allowed to use it.

L1 (Norepinephrine).Name: L1
L1 (Norepinephrine).Description: Sterile disposable syringe with a dose of L1, based on norepinephrine. It is used for short-term increase of strength and endurance, as well as to reduce the pain effect. This activates the implementation of a physiological response such as "hit or run". Increases water and energy consumption.

P22.Name: P22
P22.Description: Combat stimulator. Developed by TerraGroup Labs, marked P22. It allows the tissues of the body to receive less damage when physically exposed due to passive inclusion in the work of internal muscles. It is used to expand the body's abilities before a fight. Authorized for use by special forces soldiers. It has side effects.

AHF1-M.Name: AHF1-M
AHF1-M.Description: Military drug based on human antihemophilic factor. Developed by TerraGroup Labs as a powerful coagulant specifically for USEC operatives. Temporarily stops bleeding and increases resistance to new ones. Slightly improves health indicators, leads to dehydration.

Meldonin.Name: Meldonin
Meldonin.Description: A drug developed for athletes. Allows you to conduct more intensive training and to recover faster. Temporarily increases strength, endurance,and also accelerates recovery. An undocumented property was found, it increases the resistance of tissues to physical impact due to internal muscle tension. Because of its properties, it was later adopted by the military as a combat stimulant. It has side effects.

M.U.L.E. stimulator.Name: M.U.L.E
M.U.L.E. stimulator.Description: Muscular ultra large exciter. It is used to expand the body's abilities before long marches. It allows the body to carry an increased weight for a long time. It has shown effectiveness in combat operations in areas where transport is not available. Authorized for use by special forces soldiers. Developed by TerraGroup Labs, marked with the M. U. L. E.

Cocktail \"Obdolbos\".Name: Obdolbos
Cocktail \"Obdolbos\".Description: A syringe with a homemade drug, authored by a former employee of TerraGroup Labs. The negative effects are different each time. You can take this risk, as you still have nothing to lose.

Colt M45A1 .45 ACP pistol.Name: weapon_colt_m45a1_1143x23
Colt M45A1 .45 ACP pistol.Description:
The MEU(SOC) pistol, ("Marine Expeditionary Unit"; "Special Operations Capable") officially designated the M45 MEUSOC,is a magazine-fed, recoil-operated, single-action, semiautomatic pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge. It's a variant of the M1911, and has been the standard-issue side arm for the Force Recon Element of the United States Marine Corps' Marine Expeditionary Units since 1985.

The improved M45A1 features several changes to the original M1911A1 design. One feature is the dual recoil spring system that spreads out the recoil force of the .45 ACP round by lowering the peak force of the recoil pulse. It also has 3-dot tritium night sights, a 5-inch national match barrel, ambidextrous safety, picatinny rail, and a desert tan Cerakote finish.
